records.text: Man must be made conscious of his origin as a child of Nature. Brought into right relationship with the wilderness he would see that he was not a separate entity endowed with a divine right to subdue his fellow creatures and destroy the common heritage, but rather an integral part of a harmonious whole. He would see that his appropriation of earth's resources beyond his personal needs would only bring imbalance and beget ultimate loss and poverty for all.- Linnie Marsh Wolfe#Nature #Harmony

records.text: “My favorite quote: The land ethic simply enlarges the boundaries of the community to include soils, waters, plants, and animals, or collectively: the land... In short, a land ethic changes the role of Homo sapiens from conqueror of the land-community to plain member and citizen of it. It implies respect for his fellow-members, and also respect for the community as such.”― Aldo Leopold #Soils #LandEthic #Land #AldoLeopold

Those who die with the most toys not only do not win, they contribute to the overall failure of our species.Following the Way of Naturehttps://wayofnature.weebly.com/#Nature #Taoism
